00042 char* specTlabel[NSPECT] = { "0Ss00", "0Pp11", "0Dd02", "0Ff13", "0Gg04" };
00043 int   specTJ[NSPECT]     = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00044 int   specTL[NSPECT]     = { 0, 2, 4, 6, 8 };
00045 int   specTl[NSPECT]     = { 0, 2, 4, 6, 8 };
00046 int   specTS[NSPECT]     = { 0, 2, 0, 2, 0 };
00047 int   specTj[NSPECT]     = { 0, 2, 4, 6, 8 };
00048 int   ioT[NSPECT]        = { 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 };
00049 int   dimoT[NSPECT]      = { 1, 1, 1, 1, 1 };

00053 char* specYlabel[NSPECY] = { "0s12s12", "0p12p12", "0p32p32", "0d32d32", "0d52d52" };
00054 int   specYJ[NSPECY]     = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00055 int   specYj1[NSPECY]    = { 1, 1, 3, 3, 5 };
00056 int   specYl1[NSPECY]    = { 0, 2, 2, 4, 4 };
00057 int   specYj2[NSPECY]    = { 1, 1, 3, 3, 5 };
00058 int   specYl2[NSPECY]    = { 0, 2, 2, 4, 4 };
00059 int   ioY[NSPECY]        = { 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 };
00060 int   dimoY[NSPECY]      = { 1, 1, 1, 1, 1 };

00074   Op : OpTwoNucleonOvlapT,

00085 void initOpTwoNucleonOvlapsT(TwoNucleonOvlapsPara* par)
00086 {
00087   char* name = malloc(60);
00088   sprintf(name, "TwoNucleonOvlapsT-%05.2f-%d-%d-%d%s",
00089           par->qmax, par->npoints, par->nalpha, par->ncosb, par->recoil ? "-recoil" : "");
00090 
00091   OpTwoNucleonOvlapsT.name = name;
00092   OpTwoNucleonOvlapsT.dim = SQR(par->npoints);
00093   OpTwoNucleonOvlapsT.size = SQR(par->npoints);
00094   OpTwoNucleonOvlapsT.par = par;
00095 
00096   int i;
00097   for (i=0; i<NSPECT; i++) {
00098     char* name = malloc(60);
00099     sprintf(name, "TwoNucleonOvlapsT%s-%05.2f-%d-%d-%d%s",
00100             specTlabel[i],
00101             par->qmax, par->npoints, par->nalpha, par->ncosb, par->recoil ? "-recoil" : "");
00102     OpTwoNucleonOvlapT[i].name = name;
00103     OpTwoNucleonOvlapT[i].rank = specTJ[i];
00104     OpTwoNucleonOvlapT[i].pi = (specTL[i]+specTl[i]) % 4 ? 1 : 0;
00105     OpTwoNucleonOvlapT[i].dim = SQR(par->npoints);
00106     OpTwoNucleonOvlapT[i].size = SQR(par->npoints);
00107     OpTwoNucleonOvlapT[i].par = par;
00108     OpTwoNucleonOvlapT[i].me = NULL;
00109   }
00110 }

00140 // static SlaterDet and overlap matrices
00141 static SlaterDet *QAp;
00142 static complex double *n, *nlu;
00143 
00144 // overlap between Gaussians
00145 static complex double calcGaussianOvlap(const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2)
00146 {
00147   if (G1->xi != G2->xi)
00148     return 0.0;
00149 
00150   int T;
00151   complex double lambda, alpha, pi[3], pi2, S, R;
00152     
00153   lambda = 1.0/(conj(G1->a)+G2->a);
00154   alpha = conj(G1->a)*G2->a*lambda;
00155   for (int i=0; i<3; i++)       
00156     pi[i] = lambda*I*(conj(G1->b[i]) - G2->b[i]);
00157   pi2 = cvec3sqr(pi);
00158   
00159   T = 1;
00160   S = conj(G1->chi[0])*G2->chi[0] + conj(G1->chi[1])*G2->chi[1];
00161   R = cpow32(2*M_PI*alpha)*cexp(0.5*pi2/lambda);
00162   return (T*S*R);
00163 }
00164 
00165 
00166 // calculate overlap matrix between QA and QB
00167 static void calcOvlapsAB(const SlaterDet* QA, const SlaterDet* QB, complex double* N)
00168 {
00169   assert(QA->A+2 == QB->A);
00170   
00171   int A=QB->A;
00172   int* idxA=QA->idx; int* idxB=QB->idx; 
00173   int* ngA=QA->ng; int* ngB=QB->ng;
00174   Gaussian* GA=QA->G; Gaussian* GB=QB->G;
00175 
00176   int k,l,ki,li;
00177 
00178   // overlap matrix between QB and QA
00179 
00180   for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00181     for (k=0; k<A-2; k++) {
00182       N[k+l*A] = 0.0;
00183       if (GA[idxA[k]].xi == GB[idxB[l]].xi) { 
00184         for (li=0; li<ngB[l]; li++)
00185           for (ki=0; ki<ngA[k]; ki++) {
00186             N[k+l*A] += calcGaussianOvlap(&GA[idxA[k]+ki], &GB[idxB[l]+li]); 
00187           }
00188       }
00189     }
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 // calculate overlap matrix for QA+2nucleons with QB
00194 
00195 static void calcSpecOvlaps(const SlaterDet* QA,
00196                            int iso1, double q1[3],
00197                            int iso2, double q2[3],
00198                            const SlaterDet* QB,
00199                            complex double* N, complex double* Nlu,
00200                            complex double spec[2][2])
00201 {
00202   assert(QA->A+2 == QB->A);
00203   
00204   int A=QB->A;
00205   int ngaussB=QB->ngauss; 
00206   int* idxB=QB->idx; int* ngB=QB->ng;
00207   Gaussian* GB=QB->G;
00208 
00209   int l,li;
00210 
00211   double q12 = vec3sqr(q1);
00212   double q22 = vec3sqr(q2);
00213 
00214   int ipiv[A];
00215   int info;
00216 
00217   // overlap matrix elements of QB with QA should have been calculated already
00218 
00219   // overlap matrix elements with plane wave
00220   // isospin overlap zero or one by definition
00221 
00222   // spatial overlap is independent from spin: calculate only once
00223   complex double nR1[ngaussB], nR2[ngaussB];
00224   Gaussian* g;
00225 
00226   for (li=0; li<ngaussB; li++) {
00227     g = &GB[li];
00228     if (iso1 != g->xi)
00229       nR1[li] = 0.0;
00230     else
00231       nR1[li] = cpow32(g->a)* cexp(-0.5*g->a*q12 - I*(q1[0]*g->b[0]+q1[1]*g->b[1]+q1[2]*g->b[2]));
00232     if (iso2 != g->xi)
00233       nR2[li] = 0.0;
00234     else
00235       nR2[li] = cpow32(g->a)* cexp(-0.5*g->a*q22 - I*(q2[0]*g->b[0]+q2[1]*g->b[1]+q2[2]*g->b[2]));
00236   }
00237 
00238   // be careful: chi[0] is the spin up, chi[1] the spin-down component
00239   // but destroying a spin-up is a spin-down operator
00240   // tensor operator matrix elements go from 0: -m ... m
00241 
00242   // spin-up/spin-up plane waves in bra
00243   for (l=0; l<A; l++) {
00244     N[(A-2)+l*A] = 0.0;
00245     N[(A-1)+l*A] = 0.0;
00246     for (li=0; li<ngB[l]; li++) {
00247       N[(A-2)+l*A] += GB[idxB[l]+li].chi[0]* nR1[idxB[l]+li];
00248       N[(A-1)+l*A] += GB[idxB[l]+li].chi[0]* nR2[idxB[l]+li];
00249     }
00250   }
00251 
00252   copycmat(A, N, Nlu);
00253   FORTRAN(zgetrf)(&A, &A, Nlu, &A, ipiv, &info);
00254   FORTRAN(zdet)(Nlu, &A, &A, ipiv, &spec[1][1]);
00255 
00256   // spin-up/spin-down plane waves in bra
00257   for (l=0; l<A; l++) {
00258     N[(A-2)+l*A] = 0.0;
00259     N[(A-1)+l*A] = 0.0;
00260     for (li=0; li<ngB[l]; li++) {
00261       N[(A-2)+l*A] += GB[idxB[l]+li].chi[0]* nR1[idxB[l]+li];
00262       N[(A-1)+l*A] += GB[idxB[l]+li].chi[1]* nR2[idxB[l]+li];
00263     }
00264   }
00265 
00266   copycmat(A, N, Nlu);
00267   FORTRAN(zgetrf)(&A, &A, Nlu, &A, ipiv, &info);
00268   FORTRAN(zdet)(Nlu, &A, &A, ipiv, &spec[1][0]);
00269 
00270   // spin-down/spin-up plane waves in bra
00271   for (l=0; l<A; l++) {
00272     N[(A-2)+l*A] = 0.0;
00273     N[(A-1)+l*A] = 0.0;
00274     for (li=0; li<ngB[l]; li++) {
00275       N[(A-2)+l*A] += GB[idxB[l]+li].chi[1]* nR1[idxB[l]+li];
00276       N[(A-1)+l*A] += GB[idxB[l]+li].chi[0]* nR2[idxB[l]+li];
00277     }
00278   }
00279 
00280   copycmat(A, N, Nlu);
00281   FORTRAN(zgetrf)(&A, &A, Nlu, &A, ipiv, &info);
00282   FORTRAN(zdet)(Nlu, &A, &A, ipiv, &spec[0][1]);
00283   
00284   // spin-down/spin-down plane waves in bra
00285   for (l=0; l<A; l++) {
00286     N[(A-2)+l*A] = 0.0;
00287     N[(A-1)+l*A] = 0.0;
00288     for (li=0; li<ngB[l]; li++) {
00289       N[(A-2)+l*A] += GB[idxB[l]+li].chi[1]* nR1[idxB[l]+li];
00290       N[(A-1)+l*A] += GB[idxB[l]+li].chi[1]* nR2[idxB[l]+li];
00291     }
00292   }
00293 
00294   copycmat(A, N, Nlu);
00295   FORTRAN(zgetrf)(&A, &A, Nlu, &A, ipiv, &info);
00296   FORTRAN(zdet)(Nlu, &A, &A, ipiv, &spec[0][0]);
00297 
00298 }
00299 
00300 
00301 // hermitian adjoint of destruction operator is tricky
00302 // tilde{a}_j,m = (-1)^(j+m) a_j,-m
00303 
00304 // to be done
00305 void calcTwoNucleonOvlapsTod(TwoNucleonOvlapsPara* par,
00306                              const SlaterDet* QA, const SlaterDet* QB,
00307                              const SlaterDetAux* dummyX,
00308                              complex double* specamplitude)
00309 {
00310   double qmax = par->qmax;
00311   int ialphaQ, ialphaq, nalpha = par->nalpha;
00312   int icosbQ, icosbq, ncosb = par->ncosb;
00313   int npoints = par->npoints; int npoints2 = SQR(npoints);
00314   int ML, ml, ms1, ms2, MS, mj, M, o, iQ, iq;
00315   int L, l, S, j, J;
00316   double alphaQ, alphaq, betaQ, betaq, weightQ, weightq;
00317   double Ql, ql, Q[3], q[3], k1[3], k2[3];
00318   complex double sa[2][2];
00319   int gaussoverlapsdone = 0;
00320 
00321   // initialize workspace if necessary
00322   if (!QAp) {
00323     QAp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00324     initSlaterDet(QA, QAp);
00325     
00326     n = malloc(SQR(QB->A)*sizeof(complex double));
00327     nlu = malloc(SQR(QB->A)*sizeof(complex double));
00328   }
00329 
00330   copySlaterDet(QA, QAp);
00331 
00332   // add two nucleons with momenta q1 and q2
00333   // proton/proton or neutron/neutron
00334   int iso1, iso2;
00335   if (QA->Z == QB->Z) {
00336     iso1 = -1; iso2 = -1;
00337   } else if (QA->Z+1 == QB->Z) {
00338     fprintf(stderr, "pn case not implemented yet !\n");
00339     exit(-1);
00340   } else if (QA->Z+2 == QB->Z) {
00341     iso1 = +1; iso2 = +1;
00342   }
00343 
00344   double massA = QA->Z*mproton+QA->N*mneutron;
00345   double mass1 = (iso1 == +1) ? mproton : mneutron;
00346   double mass2 = (iso2 == +1) ? mproton : mneutron;
00347 
00348   for (o=0; o<NSPECT; o++)
00349     for (int i=0; i<dimoT[o]*npoints2; i++)
00350       specamplitude[i+ioT[o]*npoints2] = 0.0;
00351 
00352   double alphal[nalpha], walphal[nalpha];
00353   double cosbl[ncosb], wcosbl[ncosb];
00354   
00355   ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(nalpha, 0, 2*M_PI, 0.0, alphal, walphal);
00356   GaussLegendrePoints(ncosb, -1, 1, cosbl, wcosbl); 
00357 
00358   for (iQ=0; iQ<npoints; iQ++) {
00359     Ql = 2*qmax* iQ/(npoints-1);
00360     for (ialphaQ=0; ialphaQ<nalpha; ialphaQ++)
00361       for (icosbQ=0; icosbQ<ncosb; icosbQ++) {
00362         alphaQ = alphal[ialphaQ];
00363         betaQ = acos(cosbl[icosbQ]);
00364         weightQ = walphal[ialphaQ]*wcosbl[icosbQ];
00365 
00366         Q[0] = Ql*cos(alphaQ)*sin(betaQ); 
00367         Q[1] = Ql*sin(alphaQ)*sin(betaQ);
00368         Q[2] = Ql*cos(betaQ);
00369 
00370         if (par->recoil) {
00371           // boost QA by -Q
00372           double VcmA[3] = {-Q[0]/massA, -Q[1]/massA, -Q[2]/massA};
00373           copySlaterDet(QA, QAp);
00374           boostSlaterDet(QAp, VcmA);
00375           gaussoverlapsdone = 0;
00376         }
00377 
00378         if (!gaussoverlapsdone) {
00379           calcOvlapsAB(QAp, QB, n);
00380           gaussoverlapsdone = 1;
00381         }
00382 
00383         for (iq=0; iq<npoints; iq++) {
00384           ql = qmax* iq/(npoints-1);
00385           for (ialphaq=0; ialphaq<nalpha; ialphaq++)
00386             for (icosbq=0; icosbq<ncosb; icosbq++) {
00387               alphaq = alphal[ialphaq];
00388               betaq = acos(cosbl[icosbq]);
00389               weightq = walphal[ialphaq]*wcosbl[icosbq];
00390 
00391               q[0] = ql*cos(alphaq)*sin(betaq); 
00392               q[1] = ql*sin(alphaq)*sin(betaq);
00393               q[2] = ql*cos(betaq);
00394 
00395               for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00396                 k1[i] = q[i] + mass1/(mass1+mass2)*Q[i];
00397                 k2[i] = -q[i] + mass2/(mass1+mass2)*Q[i];
00398               }
00399 
00400               calcSpecOvlaps(QAp, iso1, k1, iso2, k2, QB, n, nlu, sa);
00401 
00402               for (ms1=-1; ms1<=1; ms1=ms1+2) {
00403                 for (ms2=-1; ms2<=1; ms2=ms2+2) {
00404 
00405                   for (o=0; o<NSPECT; o++) {
00406                     l = specTl[o]; S = specTS[o]; j = specTj[o];
00407                     L = specTL[o]; J = specTJ[o];
00408                     
00409                     MS = ms1+ms2;
00410                     if (-S<=MS && MS <= S) {
00411                       for (M=-J; M<=J; M=M+2) {
00412                         for (ML=-L; ML<=L; ML=ML+2) {
00413                           mj = M-ML;
00414                           if (-j<=mj && mj<=j) {
00415                             ml = mj-MS;
00416                             if (-l<=ml && ml<=l) {
00417 
00418                               // are the phase factors correct ?
00419 
00420                               specamplitude[(-M+J)/2 + (iq+iQ*npoints)*dimoY[o] + ioY[o]*npoints2] += 1.0/sqrt(2.0)*weightQ*weightq*
00421                                 ((1-ms1)%4 ? -1 : +1)* ((1-ms2)%4 ? -1 : +1)*
00422                                 ((l-ml)%4 ? -1 : +1)* ((L-ML)%4 ? -1 : +1)*
00423                                 clebsch(L, j, J, ML, mj, M)*
00424                                 clebsch(l, S, j, ml, MS, mj)*
00425                                 clebsch(1, 1, S, ms1, ms2, MS)* 
00426                                 sa[(ms1+1)/2][(ms2+1)/2]* 
00427                                 conj(Y(L,ML,betaQ,alphaQ))*
00428                                 conj(Y(l,ml,betaq,alphaq));
00429                             }
00430                           }
00431                         }
00432                       }
00433                     }
00434                   }
00435                 }
00436               }
00437             }
00438         }
00439       }
00440   }     
00441 }
00442 
00443 
00444 void calcTwoNucleonOvlapsYod(TwoNucleonOvlapsPara* par,
00445                              const SlaterDet* QA, const SlaterDet* QB,
00446                              const SlaterDetAux* dummyX,
00447                              complex double* specamplitude)
00448 {
00449   double qmax = par->qmax;
00450   int ialpha1, ialpha2, nalpha = par->nalpha;
00451   int icosb1, icosb2, ncosb = par->ncosb;
00452   int npoints = par->npoints; int npoints2 = SQR(npoints);
00453   int m1, m2, ml1, ml2, ms1, ms2, M, o, i1, i2;
00454   int j1, j2, l1, l2, J;
00455   double alpha1, alpha2, beta1, beta2, weight1, weight2;
00456   double q1l, q2l, q1[3], q2[3], k1[3], k2[3];
00457   complex double sa[2][2];
00458   int gaussoverlapsdone = 0;
00459 
00460   // initialize workspace if necessary
00461   if (!QAp) {
00462     QAp = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00463     initSlaterDet(QA, QAp);
00464     
00465     n = malloc(SQR(QB->A)*sizeof(complex double));
00466     nlu = malloc(SQR(QB->A)*sizeof(complex double));
00467   }
00468 
00469   copySlaterDet(QA, QAp);
00470 
00471   // add two nucleons with momenta q1 and q2
00472   // proton/proton or neutron/neutron
00473   int iso1, iso2;
00474   if (QA->Z == QB->Z) {
00475     iso1 = -1; iso2 = -1;
00476   } else if (QA->Z+1 == QB->Z) {
00477     fprintf(stderr, "pn case not implemented yet !\n");
00478     exit(-1);
00479   } else if (QA->Z+2 == QB->Z) {
00480     iso1 = +1; iso2 = +1;
00481   }
00482 
00483   double massA = QA->Z*mproton+QA->N*mneutron;
00484   double massB = QB->Z*mproton+QB->N*mneutron;
00485   double mass1 = (iso1 == +1) ? mproton : mneutron;
00486   double mass2 = (iso2 == +1) ? mproton : mneutron;
00487 
00488   for (o=0; o<NSPECY; o++)
00489     for (int i=0; i<dimoY[o]*npoints2; i++)
00490       specamplitude[i+ioY[o]*npoints2] = 0.0;
00491 
00492   double alphal[nalpha], walphal[nalpha];
00493   double cosbl[ncosb], wcosbl[ncosb];
00494   
00495   ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(nalpha, 0, 2*M_PI, 0.0, alphal, walphal);
00496   GaussLegendrePoints(ncosb, -1, 1, cosbl, wcosbl); 
00497 
00498   for (i1=0; i1<npoints; i1++) {
00499     q1l = qmax* i1/(npoints-1);
00500     for (i2=0; i2<npoints; i2++) {
00501       q2l = qmax* i2/(npoints-1);
00502 
00503       for (ialpha1=0; ialpha1<nalpha; ialpha1++)
00504         for (icosb1=0; icosb1<ncosb; icosb1++) {
00505           alpha1 = alphal[ialpha1];
00506           beta1 = acos(cosbl[icosb1]);
00507           weight1 = walphal[ialpha1]*wcosbl[icosb1];
00508           
00509           q1[0] = q1l*cos(alpha1)*sin(beta1); 
00510           q1[1] = q1l*sin(alpha1)*sin(beta1);
00511           q1[2] = q1l*cos(beta1); 
00512 
00513           for (ialpha2=0; ialpha2<nalpha; ialpha2++)
00514             for (icosb2=0; icosb2<ncosb; icosb2++) {
00515               alpha2 = alphal[ialpha2];
00516               beta2 = acos(cosbl[icosb2]);
00517               weight2 = walphal[ialpha2]*wcosbl[icosb2];
00518 
00519               q2[0] = q2l*cos(alpha2)*sin(beta2); 
00520               q2[1] = q2l*sin(alpha2)*sin(beta2);
00521               q2[2] = q2l*cos(beta2);
00522 
00523               if (par->recoil) {
00524                 for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00525                   k1[i] = q1[i] - mass1/(mass1+massA)*q2[i];
00526                   k2[i] = q2[i];
00527                 } 
00528               } else {
00529                 for (int i=0; i<3; i++) {
00530                   k1[i] = q1[i];
00531                   k2[i] = q2[i];
00532                 }
00533               }
00534 
00535               if (par->recoil) {
00536                 // boost QA by -(k1+k2)
00537                 double VcmA[3] = {-(k1[0]+k2[0])/massA, -(k1[1]+k2[1])/massA, -(k1[2]+k2[2])/massA};
00538                 copySlaterDet(QA, QAp);
00539                 boostSlaterDet(QAp, VcmA);
00540                 gaussoverlapsdone = 0;
00541               }
00542 
00543               if (!gaussoverlapsdone) {
00544                 calcOvlapsAB(QAp, QB, n);
00545                 gaussoverlapsdone = 1;
00546               }
00547 
00548               calcSpecOvlaps(QAp, iso1, k1, iso2, k2, QB, n, nlu, sa);
00549 
00550               for (ms1=-1; ms1<=1; ms1=ms1+2) {
00551                 for (ms2=-1; ms2<=1; ms2=ms2+2) {
00552                   for (o=0; o<NSPECY; o++) {
00553                     j1 = specYj1[o]; l1 = specYl1[o];
00554                     j2 = specYj2[o]; l2 = specYl2[o];
00555                     J = specYJ[o];
00556                     
00557                     for (M=-J; M<=J; M=M+2) {
00558                       for (m1=-j1; m1<=j1; m1=m1+2) {
00559                         m2 = M-m1;
00560                         if (-j2<=m2 && m2<=j2) {
00561                           ml1 = m1-ms1;
00562                           if (-l1<=ml1 && ml1<=l1) {
00563                             ml2 = m2-ms2;
00564                             if (-l2<=ml2 && ml2<=l2) {
00565 
00566                               specamplitude[(-M+J)/2 + (i1+i2*npoints)*dimoY[o] + ioY[o]*npoints2] += 1.0/sqrt(2.0)*weight1*weight2*
00567                                 clebsch(j1, j2, J, m1, m2, M)*
00568                                 ((j1-m1)%4 ? -1 : +1)* ((j2-m2)%4 ? -1 : +1)*
00569                                 clebsch(l1, 1, j1, ml1, ms1, m1)*
00570                                 clebsch(l2, 1, j2, ml2, ms2, m2)* 
00571                                 sa[(ms1+1)/2][(ms2+1)/2]* 
00572                                 conj(Y(l1,ml1,beta1,alpha1))*
00573                                 conj(Y(l2,ml2,beta2,alpha2));
00574                             }
00575                           }
00576                         }
00577                       }
00578                     }
00579                   }
00580                 }
00581               }
00582             }
00583         }
00584     }
00585   }     
00586 }
00587 
00588 // output routine
00589 
00590 
00591 void writeTwoNucleonOvlapsT(FILE* fp,
00592                             const Projection* P,
00593                             const TwoNucleonOvlapsPara* p,
00594                             int jfin, int pfin, int afin,
00595                             int jini, int pini, int aini,
00596                             void* specamplitudeme,
00597                             const Eigenstates* Efin,
00598                             const Eigenstates* Eini)
00599 {
00600   int jmax = P->jmax;
00601   int ipjfin = idxpij(jmax,pfin,jfin);
00602   int ipjini = idxpij(jmax,pini,jini);
00603   int npoints = p->npoints;
00604   double qmax = p->qmax;
00605   int idxfin = Efin->index[ipjfin][afin];
00606   int idxini = Eini->index[ipjini][aini];
00607   double normfin = Efin->norm[ipjfin][idxfin];
00608   double normini = Eini->norm[ipjini][idxini];
00609   complex double (****specampme)[npoints] = specamplitudeme;
00610   complex double *sa = specampme[ipjfin][ipjini][idxfin][idxini];
00611   int iQ, iq;
00612   double Q, q;
00613   complex double ml;
00614   
00615   // calculate spectroscopic factor
00616   double dQ = 2*qmax/(npoints-1);
00617   double dq = qmax/(npoints-1);
00618 
00619   double S = 0.0;
00620   for (iQ=0; iQ<npoints; iQ++) {
00621     Q = iQ*dQ;
00622     for (iq=0; iq<npoints; iq++) {
00623       q = iq*dq;
00624 
00625       S += dq*SQR(q)*dQ*SQR(Q)* (jfin+1.0)/(jini+1.0)*
00626         SQR(cabs(sa[iq+iQ*npoints]))/(normfin*normini);
00627     }
00628   }
00629   fprintf(stderr, "Spectroscopic factor: %6.3f\n", S);
00630 
00631   for (iQ=0; iQ<npoints; iQ++) {
00632     Q = iQ*dQ;
00633 
00634     for (iq=0; iq<npoints; iq++) {
00635       q = iq*dq;
00636 
00637       ml = sqrt((jfin+1.0)/(jini+1.0))* sa[iq+iQ*npoints]/sqrt(normfin*normini);
00638 
00639       fprintf(fp, "(%13.5g, %13.5g)\t", creal(ml), cimag(ml));
00640     }
00641     fprintf(fp, "\n");
00642   }
00643 
00644 }
00645 
00646 
00647 void writeTwoNucleonOvlapsY(FILE* fp,
00648                             const Projection* P,
00649                             const TwoNucleonOvlapsPara* p,
00650                             int jfin, int pfin, int afin,
00651                             int jini, int pini, int aini,
00652                             void* specamplitudeme,
00653                             const Eigenstates* Efin,
00654                             const Eigenstates* Eini)
00655 {
00656   int jmax = P->jmax;
00657   int ipjfin = idxpij(jmax,pfin,jfin);
00658   int ipjini = idxpij(jmax,pini,jini);
00659   int npoints = p->npoints;
00660   double qmax = p->qmax;
00661   int idxfin = Efin->index[ipjfin][afin];
00662   int idxini = Eini->index[ipjini][aini];
00663   double normfin = Efin->norm[ipjfin][idxfin];
00664   double normini = Eini->norm[ipjini][idxini];
00665   complex double (****specampme)[npoints] = specamplitudeme;
00666   complex double *sa = specampme[ipjfin][ipjini][idxfin][idxini];
00667   int i1, i2;
00668   double q1, q2;
00669   complex double ml;
00670   
00671   // calculate spectroscopic factor
00672   double dq = qmax/(npoints-1);
00673 
00674   double S = 0.0;
00675   for (i2=0; i2<npoints; i2++) {
00676     q2 = i2*dq;
00677     for (i1=0; i1<npoints; i1++) {
00678       q1 = i1*dq;
00679 
00680       S += dq*SQR(q1)*dq*SQR(q2)* (jfin+1.0)/(jini+1.0)*
00681         SQR(cabs(sa[i1+i2*npoints]))/(normfin*normini);
00682     }
00683   }
00684   fprintf(stderr, "Spectroscopic factor: %6.3f\n", S);
00685 
00686   for (i1=0; i1<npoints; i1++) {
00687     q1 = i1*dq;
00688 
00689     for (i2=0; i2<npoints; i2++) {
00690       q2 = i2*dq;
00691 
00692       ml = sqrt((jfin+1.0)/(jini+1.0))* sa[i1+i2*npoints]/sqrt(normfin*normini);
00693 
00694       fprintf(fp, "(%13.5g, %13.5g)\t", creal(ml), cimag(ml));
00695     }
00696     fprintf(fp, "\n");
00697   }
00698 
00699 }
